mapper.update: update db_alisupplier set DOMAININPLATFORMS = #{domaininplatforms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGINID = #{loginid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADE = #{trade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_LIST = #{goodsList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAVORITE = #{favorite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTENTION = #{attention,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLYID = #{supplyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANYNAME = #{companyname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select USERID, DOMAININPLATFORMS, LOGINID, TRADE, GOODS_LIST, FAVORITE, ATTENTION, SUPPLYID, COMPANYNAME from db_alisupplier where USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select USERID, DOMAININPLATFORMS, LOGINID, TRADE, GOODS_LIST, FAVORITE, ATTENTION, SUPPLYID, COMPANYNAME from db_alisupplier
